ValidationRule.description: After the goodwill amount has been approved, the amount field is locked. Claims Managers can uncheck the Goodwill Amount Approved box, which will then let someone edit the amount again.This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential Claims
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Goodwill_Amount_Approved__c = true, ISCHANGED( GoodwillClaimAmount__c ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your Goodwill amount has already been approved and cannot be changed. Please contact a Claims Manager if you need to change this.
